column4: i have this command line:   <dvsink-files -h 127.0.0.1 -p 8080 namefile> i want create a launcher with a popup for write <namefile>, do it's possible? i am newbe....
its possible, via bash and some of the gui-dialog commands..
or you could make a nautilus script for it. that you select a file, then run the script
theres a dozen ways you could do it.. depending on the details.
